mentions.context: The R package EdgeR (Robinson et al., 2010) was used to identify differential gene expression.
The raw read counts, calculated with FeatureCount, were used as the input of EdgeR.
GO term enrichment analysis was performed with agriGO v2.0 (Tian et al., 2017), using Fisher's exact statistic test and Yekutieli multi-test adjustment method (value of p < 0.05).
Differential expression analyses were performed with EdgeR exact test, according to the evidence of Schurch et al. (2016).
"Darmor-bzh" (Version 4.1; Chalhoub et al., 2014), using STAR, version 2.5.2a (Dobin et al., 2013).
The raw read counts, calculated with FeatureCount, were used as the input of EdgeR.
The reads aligned to B. napus genome were used to generate gene read counts based on B. napus annotation (Version 5) with FeatureCounts, version 1.5.0 (Liao et al., 2014).
